summary: Just as John travels to visit his father, he witnesses his death and suffers a gun wound - a beautiful woman is kind enough to help him bring the killers to justice, but jealousy from another man may cause problems.
cast: John Wayne|Marion Burns|Dennis Moore|Reed Howes|Joseph De Grasse|Yakima Canutt|Earl Dwire|Nelson McDowell|Chris Allen|Chuck Baldra|Barney Beasley|Bert Dillard|Jack Evans|Herman Hack|Jack Jones|George Morrell|Tex Palmer|Fred Parker|Tex Phelps|Archie Ricks|James Sheridan
director: Director: Robert N. Bradbury (as R.N. Bradbury)
title: El jinete del alba
